original: @181b rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @181b rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: badzra dzny'a na sa mutstsha ya n'a ma tantra /
analyzed: badzra dzny'a na sa mutstsha ya n'a ma tantra /
translated: Vajra-j√±ana-samuccaya-nama-tantra

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: ye shes rdo rje kun las btus pa zhes bya ba'i rgyud /
analyzed: ye shes rdo rje kun las btus pa zhes bya ba'i rgyud /
translated: The Tantra Called the Compendium of Vajra Wisdom

original: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to all the Buddhas and Bodhisattvas.

original: ji skad du bcom ldan 'das kyis ye shes rdo rje kun las btus pa'i rgyud las ji lta ba bzhin du gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: ji skad du bcom ldan 'das kyis ye shes rdo rje kun las btus pa'i rgyud las ji lta ba bzhin du gsungs pa'o //
translated: Just as it was taught by the Blessed One in the Tantra of the Compendium of Vajra Wisdom.

original: byams pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' drug stong gis bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa /
analyzed: byams pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' drug stong gis bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa /
translated: The six thousand Bodhisattvas, Maitreya and so forth, asked the Blessed One:

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: ma rig pa dang / sems las byung ba dang / sems zhes bgyi ba ci lags /
analyzed: ma rig pa dang / sems las byung ba dang / sems zhes bgyi ba ci lags /
translated: what is ignorance, what is mental activity, and what is mind?

original: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rjes bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rjes bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One, the Vajra of the Body, Speech, and Mind of all the Tathagatas, said:

original: rigs kyi bu nyon cig /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu nyon cig /
translated: Son of noble family, listen!

original: ye shes gsum rdo rje las yang dag par byung ba de'i phyir ye shes gsum rdo rje'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: ye shes gsum rdo rje las yang dag par byung ba de'i phyir ye shes gsum rdo rje'i rang bzhin no //
translated: Because it arises from the three wisdom vajras, it is the nature of the three wisdom vajras.

original: byams pas gsol ba /
analyzed: byams pas gsol ba /
translated: Maitreya asked:

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: BhagavƒÅn,

original: ye shes gsum rdo rje'i ngo bo ji ltar lags /
analyzed: ye shes gsum rdo rje'i ngo bo ji ltar lags /
translated: what is the nature of the three vajra wisdoms?

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The BhagavƒÅn replied:

original: yang dag pa'i mtha' zab pa //
analyzed: yang dag pa'i mtha' zab pa //
translated: The profound limit of reality

original: 'gag pa med pa /
analyzed: 'gag pa med pa /
translated: is without cessationüîΩand without arising.

original: skye ba med pa de'i rkyen gyis ma rig pa ste /
analyzed: skye ba med pa de'i rkyen gyis ma rig pa ste /
translated: The condition of that is ignorance.

original: ma rig pa zhes bya ba dang / snang ba nye bar thob pa dang / stong pa chen po'o //
analyzed: ma rig pa zhes bya ba dang / snang ba nye bar thob pa dang / stong pa chen po'o //
translated: What is called ‚Äúignorance‚Äù is the attainment of light and great emptiness.

original: de yang rtogs par dka' ba'o //
analyzed: de yang rtogs par dka' ba'o //
translated: That is also difficult to realize.

original: 'on kyang snang ba dang bcas par brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: 'on kyang snang ba dang bcas par brjod par bya'o //
translated: However, it should be explained as being endowed with appearance.

original: ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis sems las byung ba ste /
analyzed: ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis sems las byung ba ste /
translated: The condition of ignorance is mental activity.üîΩThat is

original: de ni / snang ba @182a *//
analyzed: de ni / snang ba @182a *//
translated: light,

original: mched pa dang / shin tu stong pa zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: mched pa dang / shin tu stong pa zhes gsungs so //
translated: increase, and complete emptiness.

original: sems las byung ba'i rkyen gyis sems te /
analyzed: sems las byung ba'i rkyen gyis sems te /
translated: The condition of mental activity is the mind.üîΩThat is

original: de ni / snang ba dang / stong pa ste /
analyzed: de ni / snang ba dang / stong pa ste /
translated: appearance and emptiness.

original: sems dang / sems las byung ba dang / ma rig pa'i rang bzhin bdag med pa'o //
analyzed: sems dang / sems las byung ba dang / ma rig pa'i rang bzhin bdag med pa'o //
translated: The mind, mental activity, and ignorance are the nature of selflessness.

original: gsum po de dang de 'od gsal ba las byung ba'i rdo rje'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: gsum po de dang de 'od gsal ba las byung ba'i rdo rje'i rang bzhin no //
translated: These three are the nature of the vajra, arisen from clear light.

original: de nas byams pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad ngo mtshar du gyur pas cang mi smra bar gyur to //
analyzed: de nas byams pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad ngo mtshar du gyur pas cang mi smra bar gyur to //
translated: Then, all those bodhisattvas, Maitreya and so forth, became amazed and fell silent.

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rjes byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de rnams cang mi smra bar 'dug pa mthong nas bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rjes byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de rnams cang mi smra bar 'dug pa mthong nas bka' stsal pa /
translated: Then, the Blessed One, the vajra of the body, speech, and mind of all tathƒÅgatas, seeing those bodhisattva mahƒÅsattvas sitting in silence, said:

original: rigs kyi bu /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu /
translated: ‚ÄúSons of good family!

original: ci'i phyir cang mi smra bar gyur pas 'dug /
analyzed: ci'i phyir cang mi smra bar gyur pas 'dug /
translated: Why do you sit in silence?‚Äù

original: de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po de rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la phyag btsal te gtugs nas gzhan yang zhus pa /
analyzed: de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po de rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la phyag btsal te gtugs nas gzhan yang zhus pa /
translated: Then, those bodhisattva mahƒÅsattvas bowed to the Blessed One‚Äôs two feet, touched their heads to them, and asked again:

original: ae ma'o ston pa /
analyzed: ae ma'o ston pa /
translated: ‚ÄúAmazing, Teacher!

original: rtogs par dka' ba rnam par shes pa gsum gyi dbye ba mchog tu zab pa bcom ldan 'das bshad du gsol /
analyzed: rtogs par dka' ba rnam par shes pa gsum gyi dbye ba mchog tu zab pa bcom ldan 'das bshad du gsol /
translated: Please explain, Blessed One, the supreme profundity of the division of the three consciousnesses, which is difficult to understand.‚Äù

original: bde bar gshegs pa bshad du gsol /
analyzed: bde bar gshegs pa bshad du gsol /
translated: Sugata, please explain.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said:

original: gang 'od gsal ba las byang chub se  par shes pa de nyid sems dang / yid dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bya la /
analyzed: gang 'od gsal ba las byang chub se  par shes pa de nyid sems dang / yid dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bya la /
translated: That which is known as enlightenment from clear light is called mind, thought, and consciousness.

original: de ni / chos thams cad kyi rtsa ba ste /
analyzed: de ni / chos thams cad kyi rtsa ba ste /
translated: It is the root of all phenomena.

original: kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i @182b bdag nyid de las rtog pa gnyis su gyur te bdag dang / gzhan dag tu'o //
analyzed: kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i @182b bdag nyid de las rtog pa gnyis su gyur te bdag dang / gzhan dag tu'o //
translated: From it, the two concepts arise: self and other.

original: rnam par shes pa de'i bzhon pa rlung ngo //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa de'i bzhon pa rlung ngo //
translated: The mount of that consciousness is wind.

original: rlung las me'o //
analyzed: rlung las me'o //
translated: From wind, fire.

original: me las chu'o //
analyzed: me las chu'o //
translated: From fire, water.

original: chu las sa'o //
analyzed: chu las sa'o //
translated: From water, earth.

original: de rnams las phung po lnga dang / skye mched drug dang / yul lnga ste /
analyzed: de rnams las phung po lnga dang / skye mched drug dang / yul lnga ste /
translated: From those, the five aggregates, the six sense bases, and the five objects.

original: de dag thams cad ni /
analyzed: de dag thams cad ni /
translated: All of those

original: rnam par shes pa rlung dang 'dres pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa rlung dang 'dres pa'o //
translated: are consciousness mixed with wind.

original: de nas rnam par shes pa gsum gyi rang bzhin gyi snang ba rab tu gsal bar spyod pa rjes su myong bar byed de /
analyzed: de nas rnam par shes pa gsum gyi rang bzhin gyi snang ba rab tu gsal bar spyod pa rjes su myong bar byed de /
translated: Then, the experience of the clear manifestation of the appearance of the nature of the three consciousnesses occurs.

original: snang ba'i rgyus rang bzhin rnams yang dag par 'byung ngo //
analyzed: snang ba'i rgyus rang bzhin rnams yang dag par 'byung ngo //
translated: The nature of the elements arises from the cause of appearance.

original: de las 'od gsal ba /
analyzed: de las 'od gsal ba /
translated: From that, there is clear light.

original: gnas pa med pa /
analyzed: gnas pa med pa /
translated: There is no abiding.

original: 'gag pa med pa /
analyzed: 'gag pa med pa /
translated: There is no cessation.

original: skye ba med pa /
analyzed: skye ba med pa /
translated: There is no arising.

original: don dam pa'i bden pa /
analyzed: don dam pa'i bden pa /
translated: There is ultimate truth.

original: yang dag pa'i mtha' ste /
analyzed: yang dag pa'i mtha' ste /
translated: There is the perfect limit.

original: de las byung ba'i mun pa'i snang ba ni /
analyzed: de las byung ba'i mun pa'i snang ba ni /
translated: From that, the appearance of darkness arises.

original: ma rig pa'o //
analyzed: ma rig pa'o //
translated: That is ignorance.

original: de'i rang bzhin lta ba dang / 'khrul ba dang / rnam par g-yeng ba dang / brjed nges pa dang / le lo dang / mi smra ba dang / mi gsal ba'o //
analyzed: de'i rang bzhin lta ba dang / 'khrul ba dang / rnam par g-yeng ba dang / brjed nges pa dang / le lo dang / mi smra ba dang / mi gsal ba'o //
translated: Its nature is view, delusion, distraction, forgetfulness, laziness, silence, and obscurity.

original: ma rig pa sems las byung ba ste /
analyzed: ma rig pa sems las byung ba ste /
translated: Ignorance is a mental factor.

original: nyi ma'i snang ba lta bu dang / shin tu gsal ba'i smig rgyu ba lta bu'o //
analyzed: nyi ma'i snang ba lta bu dang / shin tu gsal ba'i smig rgyu ba lta bu'o //
translated: It is like the appearance of the sun and like a very clear mirage.

original: de'i rang bzhin 'dod chags dang / dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba dang / drag po la sogs pa dang / kun rdzob tu mngon sum du skyes pa'i gzugs dang / lha'i tshogs dang / mtshan ma dang / rdo rje'i brda'o //
analyzed: de'i rang bzhin 'dod chags dang / dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba dang / drag po la sogs pa dang / kun rdzob tu mngon sum du skyes pa'i gzugs dang / lha'i tshogs dang / mtshan ma dang / rdo rje'i brda'o //
translated: Its nature is desire, joy, supreme joy, violence, and so on. It is the direct arising of relative form, the assembly of deities, the sign, and the vajra symbol.

original: sems las byung ba las sems te /
analyzed: sems las byung ba las sems te /
translated: From the mental factor, there is the mind.

original: zla ba'i snang ba dang / shin tu gsal ba'i chu'i zla ba lta bu'o //
analyzed: zla ba'i snang ba dang / shin tu gsal ba'i chu'i zla ba lta bu'o //
translated: like the moon‚Äôs reflection in water, or a very clear moon.üîΩ

original: rang bzhin ni /üîΩ'dod chags dang bral ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: rang bzhin ni / 'dod chags dang bral ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: The nature is the appearance of the moon and the very clear moon in the water.

original: kun rdzob @183a *//
analyzed: kun rdzob @183a *//
translated: The nature is freedom from passion and so forth.

original: tu ni / mngon sum gyi bud med dang / bhu ga dang / padma dang / lha mo'i tshogs kyi brda'o //
analyzed: tu ni / mngon sum gyi bud med dang / bhu ga dang / padma dang / lha mo'i tshogs kyi brda'o //
translated: The conventional is the sign of the actual woman, the bhaga, the lotus, and the host of goddesses.

original: rdo rje dang padma yang dag par sbyor ba las shes rab kyi ye shes byung ba las rang gi rdo rje'i 'bad pa las me'o //
analyzed: rdo rje dang padma yang dag par sbyor ba las shes rab kyi ye shes byung ba las rang gi rdo rje'i 'bad pa las me'o //
translated: From the union of the vajra and lotus, the wisdom of wisdom arises, from the effort of one's vajra, fire.

original: me las chu ste /
analyzed: me las chu ste /
translated: From fire, water.

original: nur nur po'i rnam pa dang / de las mer mer po dang / nar nar po dang / gor gor bo dag go /
analyzed: nur nur po'i rnam pa dang / de las mer mer po dang / nar nar po dang / gor gor bo dag go /
translated: From that, the oval, the oblong, the cylindrical, and the globular.

original: de nas 'dod chags dang bral ba'i snang ba la khrag gi gong bu mkhrang gyur rnams so //
analyzed: de nas 'dod chags dang bral ba'i snang ba la khrag gi gong bu mkhrang gyur rnams so //
translated: Then, in the appearance of freedom from passion, the blood-filled globules.

original: de khu ba dang khrag dag gis bskyed pa'o //
analyzed: de khu ba dang khrag dag gis bskyed pa'o //
translated: Those are generated by semen and blood.

original: de nas dbang po gnyis mnyam par sbyor ba las 'dod chags so //
analyzed: de nas dbang po gnyis mnyam par sbyor ba las 'dod chags so //
translated: Then, from the union of the two organs, passion.

original: 'dod chags las 'dod chags dang bral ba dang / bar ma'i 'dod chags rab tu shes par bya ste /
analyzed: 'dod chags las 'dod chags dang bral ba dang / bar ma'i 'dod chags rab tu shes par bya ste /
translated: One should know the passion that is free from passion and the passion that is in the middle.

original: de'i phyir lus te /
analyzed: de'i phyir lus te /
translated: Therefore, the body is the method of the seal of the body.

original: lus las byung ba'i skyil krung bcing ba la sogs pa dang / gsung gi phyag rgya'i thabs su gyur pa a'a li k'a li las yang dag par byung ba'i sngags dang / sems kyi phyag rgya'i thabs su gyur pa sa bon dang mtshan ma las lhar dmigs pa'o; ;gzugs la sogs pa'i yul ni /
analyzed: lus las byung ba'i skyil krung bcing ba la sogs pa dang / gsung gi phyag rgya'i thabs su gyur pa a'a li k'a li las yang dag par byung ba'i sngags dang / sems kyi phyag rgya'i thabs su gyur pa sa bon dang mtshan ma las lhar dmigs pa'o; ;gzugs la sogs pa'i yul ni /
translated: The seal of the body is the binding of the cross-legged posture and so forth that arise from the body, the mantra that arises from the vowels and consonants that are the method of the seal of speech, and the visualization of the deity that arises from the seed and sign that is the method of the seal of mind.

original: dbang po gnyis snyoms par zhugs pa'i thabs su gyur pa'o //üîΩrdo rje dang padma yang dag par sbyor ba ni /
analyzed: dbang po gnyis snyoms par zhugs pa'i thabs su gyur pa'o // rdo rje dang padma yang dag par sbyor ba ni /
translated: The object of form and so forth is the method of the union of the two organs.

original: sems dang sems las byung ba dag gi thabs su gyur pa'o //üîΩsems dang sems las byung ba mnyam par sbyar ba ni /
analyzed: sems dang sems las byung ba dag gi thabs su gyur pa'o // sems dang sems las byung ba mnyam par sbyar ba ni /
translated: The union of the vajra and lotus is the method of the mind and mental factors.

original: bde ba chen po'i ting nge 'dzin gyi thabs su gyur pa'o //
analyzed: bde ba chen po'i ting nge 'dzin gyi thabs su gyur pa'o //
translated: The union of the mind and mental factors is the method of the samƒÅdhi of great bliss.

original: de sgyu ma'i dpes nye bar mtshon @183b pa ste; de'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+g'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni /
analyzed: de sgyu ma'i dpes nye bar mtshon @183b pa ste; de'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+g'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni /
translated: therefore the TathƒÅgatas of as many buddha-fields as there are sand particles in the Ga·πÖgƒÅ river

original: sgyu ma lta bu dang / chu zla dang / mig yor dang / smig rgyu dang / rmi lam dang / sgra brnyan dang / dri za'i grong khyer dang / mig 'phrul dang / dbang po'i gzhu dang / glog dang / chu bur dang / me long gi gzugs brnyan lta bu ste /
analyzed: sgyu ma lta bu dang / chu zla dang / mig yor dang / smig rgyu dang / rmi lam dang / sgra brnyan dang / dri za'i grong khyer dang / mig 'phrul dang / dbang po'i gzhu dang / glog dang / chu bur dang / me long gi gzugs brnyan lta bu ste /
translated: are like an illusion, like a reflection in water, like a mirage, like a dream, like an echo, like a city of gandharvas, like an optical illusion, like a rainbow, like a flash of lightning, like a water bubble, like a reflection in a mirror.

original: sgyu ma'i dpe bcu gnyis kyis bde ba chen po'i ting nge 'dzin nye bar mtshon par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: sgyu ma'i dpe bcu gnyis kyis bde ba chen po'i ting nge 'dzin nye bar mtshon par byed pa yin no //
translated: The twelve examples of illusion illustrate the samƒÅdhi of great bliss.

original: ji ltar 'o ma bsrubs pa las mar dang / ji ltar til las til mar te /
analyzed: ji ltar 'o ma bsrubs pa las mar dang / ji ltar til las til mar te /
translated: Just as butter is churned from milk and oil from sesame seeds,

original: de bzhin du rdo rjes ni /üîΩthabs kyi ye shes nye bar mtshon pa'i phyir dang / padmas ni /
analyzed: de bzhin du rdo rjes ni / thabs kyi ye shes nye bar mtshon pa'i phyir dang / padmas ni /
translated: in the same way,üîΩthe vajra illustrates the wisdom of method

original: shes rab kyi ye shes nye bar mtshon pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: shes rab kyi ye shes nye bar mtshon pa'i phyir ro //
translated: and the lotus illustrates the wisdom of insight.

original: ji ltar 'o ma dang til yang dag par mngon par 'dus byas pa med par mar dang til mar mi 'byung ba de bzhin du sngags dang phyag rgyas mngon par 'dus byas pa'i rdo rje dang padma mnyam par sbyar ba med par rnam par shes pa gsum nye
analyzed: ji ltar 'o ma dang til yang dag par mngon par 'dus byas pa med par mar dang til mar mi 'byung ba de bzhin du sngags dang phyag rgyas mngon par 'dus byas pa'i rdo rje dang padma mnyam par sbyar ba med par rnam par shes pa gsum nye
translated: Just as butter and oil do not arise without the correct application of churning and pressing to the milk and sesame seeds, likewise, without the union of the vajra and lotus consecrated by mantra and mudra, the three consciousnessesüîΩ

original: bar mtshon par mi nus so //
analyzed: bar mtshon par mi nus so //
translated: Just as butter and oil do not arise without the proper churning of the milk and the sesame seeds, so too the three consciousnesses cannot be indicated without the union of the vajra and lotus consecrated by the mantra and the seal.

original: gang gis bha ga dang ling+ga yang dag par sbyor bar mi nus pa des ni /
analyzed: gang gis bha ga dang ling+ga yang dag par sbyor bar mi nus pa des ni /
translated: He who is unable to unite the bhaga and the li·πÖga

original: bde ba chen po'i ting nge 'dzin mi rnyed do //
analyzed: bde ba chen po'i ting nge 'dzin mi rnyed do //
translated: will not find the samƒÅdhi of great bliss.

original: bde ba chen po'i ting nge 'dzin 'ba' zhig la lhag par mos pa tsam gyis ni /
analyzed: bde ba chen po'i ting nge 'dzin 'ba' zhig la lhag par mos pa tsam gyis ni /
translated: By mere devotion to the samƒÅdhi of great bliss alone,

original: las dang po pa'i sa la gnas par 'gyur te /
analyzed: las dang po pa'i sa la gnas par 'gyur te /
translated: one will abide in the stage of the beginner.

original: phyir mi ldog pa la yang slob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: phyir mi ldog pa la yang slob par 'gyur ro //
translated: One will also train in the irreversible stage.

original: gang rdo rje dang padma mnyam par sbyor ba'i bde bas rang bzhin snang ba yang dag par nye bar mtshon par byed pa @184a *//
analyzed: gang rdo rje dang padma mnyam par sbyor ba'i bde bas rang bzhin snang ba yang dag par nye bar mtshon par byed pa @184a *//
translated: He who indicates the appearance of the nature by the bliss of the union of the vajra and lotus

original: de ni; bde ba chen po'i go 'phang la rab tu gnas par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ni; bde ba chen po'i go 'phang la rab tu gnas par 'gyur ro //
translated: He will be well-established in the state of great bliss.

original: 'di ni / sbas pa'i bshad pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni / sbas pa'i bshad pa'o //
translated: This is the hidden explanation.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis gsol pa /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis gsol pa /
translated: The bodhisattva mahƒÅsattvas said:

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: BhagavƒÅn,

original: spyi'i don ji ltar lags /
analyzed: spyi'i don ji ltar lags /
translated: what is the general meaning?

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The BhagavƒÅn replied:

original: nyan thos la sogs pa 'dod chags dang bral ba'i chos spyod pa rnam par rtog pa'i bag chags las ma grol ba rnams rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dag tu btsun mo'i bha ga la bzhugs zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'dod chags kyi chos gsal bar byed pa

translated: The accomplishment of the analysis of the eight great accomplishments, such as mantra, medicine, fire sacrifice, powder, eye medicine, swift feet, and so on,

original: rtog pa'i rgyud la bzhugs so //
analyzed: rtog pa'i rgyud la bzhugs so //
translated: is present in the Yoga Tantra.

original: byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis gsol ba /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis gsol ba /
translated: The great bodhisattvas said:

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: BhagavƒÅn,

original: rgyan rnam pa bdun ji ltar lags /
analyzed: rgyan rnam pa bdun ji ltar lags /
translated: what are the seven ornaments?

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The BhagavƒÅn replied:

original: glang bslang ba rnam pa lnga dang / mtha' drug gi bshad pa dang / rig pa rnam pa bzhi dang / bshad pa rnam pa bzhi dang / dbye ba rnam pa gnyis dang / gang zag rnam pa lnga'i slob ma brtag pa dang / bden pa rnam pa gnyis kyi dgongs pa rnams so //üîΩgleng bslang ba rnam pa lnga ni /
analyzed: glang bslang ba rnam pa lnga dang / mtha' drug gi bshad pa dang / rig pa rnam pa bzhi dang / bshad pa rnam pa bzhi dang / dbye ba rnam pa gnyis dang / gang zag rnam pa lnga'i slob ma brtag pa dang / bden pa rnam pa gnyis kyi dgongs pa rnams so // gleng bslang ba rnam pa lnga ni /
translated: The five kinds of introduction, the explanation of the six limits, the four kinds of knowledge, the four kinds of explanation, the two kinds of divisions, the examination of the five kinds of disciples, and the intention of the two truths.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: The five kinds of introduction are as follows:

original: ming dang / gang gi don du byas pa dang / byed pa po dang / tshad dang / dgos pa rnams so //üîΩmtha' drug tu bshad pa ni /
analyzed: ming dang / gang gi don du byas pa dang / byed pa po dang / tshad dang / dgos pa rnams so // mtha' drug tu bshad pa ni /
translated: name, what it is for, the agent, the measure, and the purpose.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: The six parameters are explained as follows:

original: dgongs pas bshad pa dang / dgongs pa ma yin pas bshad pa dang / drang ba'i don dang / nges pa'i don dang / sgra ji bzhin pa dang / sgra ji bzhin pa ma yin pa rnams so //
analyzed: dgongs pas bshad pa dang / dgongs pa ma yin pas bshad pa dang / drang ba'i don dang / nges pa'i don dang / sgra ji bzhin pa dang / sgra ji bzhin pa ma yin pa rnams so //
translated: the intended explanation, the non-intended explanation, the interpretable meaning, the definitive meaning, the literal meaning, and the non-literal meaning.

original: rigs pa rnam pa bzhi ni /
analyzed: rigs pa rnam pa bzhi ni /
translated: The four kinds of reasoning are

original: rgyud dang / gleng gzhi dang / nges tshig dang / rgyu rnams so //
analyzed: rgyud dang / gleng gzhi dang / nges tshig dang / rgyu rnams so //
translated: the tantra, the nidƒÅna, the verbal root, and the cause.

original: bshad pa rnam pa bzhi ni /
analyzed: bshad pa rnam pa bzhi ni /
translated: The four kinds of explanation are

original: yi ge'i don dang / spyi'i don dang / sbas pa dang / mthar thug pa rnams so //
analyzed: yi ge'i don dang / spyi'i don dang / sbas pa dang / mthar thug pa rnams so //
translated: the meaning of the syllables, the general meaning, the hidden meaning, and the ultimate meaning.

original: dbye ba rnams pa gnyis ni /
analyzed: dbye ba rnams pa gnyis ni /
translated: The two kinds of divisions are

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: as follows:

original: tshogs la bshad pa dang / slob ma la bshad pa'o //
analyzed: tshogs la bshad pa dang / slob ma la bshad pa'o //
translated: the explanation for the assembly and the explanation for the disciples.

original: gang zag rnam pa lnga'i slob ma brtag pa ni /
analyzed: gang zag rnam pa lnga'i slob ma brtag pa ni /
translated: The examination of the five kinds of disciples is

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: as follows:

original: rin po che dang / tsandan dang / padma dang / padma dkar po dang / autpa la rnams so //üîΩbden pa @187a *//
analyzed: rin po che dang / tsandan dang / padma dang / padma dkar po dang / autpa la rnams so // bden pa @187a *//
translated: lotuses, white lotuses, and utpala flowers.üîΩThe two aspects of the truth

original: rnam pa gnyis kyi dgongs pa ni /
analyzed: rnam pa gnyis kyi dgongs pa ni /
translated: are the intentionüîΩof the two aspects of the truth.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: They are as follows:üîΩthe conventional truth

original: kun rdzob kyi bden pa dang / don dam pa'i bden pa'o //
analyzed: kun rdzob kyi bden pa dang / don dam pa'i bden pa'o //
translated: and the ultimate truth.

original: rigs kyi bu /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu /
translated: Son of good family,

original: kun rdzob ni /
analyzed: kun rdzob ni /
translated: the conventional

original: mi brtan pa dang / g-yo ba'o //
analyzed: mi brtan pa dang / g-yo ba'o //
translated: is unstable and wavering.

original: de'i bden pa ni /
analyzed: de'i bden pa ni /
translated: Its truth

original: chu zla lta bu'o //
analyzed: chu zla lta bu'o //
translated: is like the reflection of the moon in water.

original: don dam pa'i bden pa ni /
analyzed: don dam pa'i bden pa ni /
translated: The ultimate truth

original: stong pa chen po bco brgyad do //
analyzed: stong pa chen po bco brgyad do //
translated: is the eighteen great emptinesses.

original: de'i mtha' ni /
analyzed: de'i mtha' ni /
translated: Its limitüîΩis the abode.

original: gnas so // byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis gsol ba /
analyzed: gnas so // byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis gsol ba /
translated: The bodhisattvas asked,

original: don dam pa'i bden pa la rab tu gnas pa'i rnal 'byor chen po bas las kyi rgyal po mchog gi ting nge 'dzin la brten nas sems can gyi don ji ltar rab tu spyod par bgyid /
analyzed: don dam pa'i bden pa la rab tu gnas pa'i rnal 'byor chen po bas las kyi rgyal po mchog gi ting nge 'dzin la brten nas sems can gyi don ji ltar rab tu spyod par bgyid /
translated: ‚ÄúHow do those who abide in the ultimate truth, the great yogins, practice for the benefit of sentient beings by relying on the samƒÅdhi of the supreme king of activities?‚Äù

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The bhagavƒÅn replied:üîΩ‚ÄúOh children of good family, listen!

original: ji srid du zhi ba la sogs pa'i las kyis sems can gyi don mi byed pa de srid du yang dag pa'i mtha' la rab tu gnas par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ji srid du zhi ba la sogs pa'i las kyis sems can gyi don mi byed pa de srid du yang dag pa'i mtha' la rab tu gnas par 'gyur ro //
translated: As long as one does not perform the welfare of sentient beings by means of the activities of pacification and so forth, one remains in the limit of reality.

original: gang du sems can gyi don bya bar mthong ba de'i tshe bdag byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pas yang dag pa'i mtha' las langs te sems can gyi don byas nas yang dag pa'i mtha' nyid du 'jug par byed do //
analyzed: gang du sems can gyi don bya bar mthong ba de'i tshe bdag byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pas yang dag pa'i mtha' las langs te sems can gyi don byas nas yang dag pa'i mtha' nyid du 'jug par byed do //
translated: When one sees that the welfare of sentient beings is to be done, then, by the process of self-consecration, one rises from the limit of reality, performs the welfare of sentient beings, and again enters into the limit of reality.

original: de nas byams pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams dga' zhing mgu la yid rangs te dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas cang mi smra bar gyur to //üîΩye shes rdo rje kun las btus pa zhes bya ba rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud las /
analyzed: de nas byams pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams dga' zhing mgu la yid rangs te dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas cang mi smra bar gyur to // ye shes rdo rje kun las btus pa zhes bya ba rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud las /
translated: Then the great bodhisattvas such as Maitreya, having become joyful, delighted, and pleased, were enraptured and overjoyed, and they became silent.

original: bde ba chen po'i le'u ste rim par phye ba gnyis pa'o //
analyzed: bde ba chen po'i le'u ste rim par phye ba gnyis pa'o //
translated: The second chapter of the great yoga tantra called the Compendium of Vajra Wisdom.

original: rdzogs so //// rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzny'a na ka ra'i zhal snga @187b nas dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts'a pa khu ston dngos grub kyis bsgyur /
analyzed: rdzogs so //// rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzny'a na ka ra'i zhal snga @187b nas dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts'a pa khu ston dngos grub kyis bsgyur /
translated: The Indian abbot J√±ƒÅna-kƒ´rti and the great editor-translator Khu-ston-dngos-grub-shes-rab translated it.

original: slad nas bla ma de nyid dang / dge slong tshul khrims rgyal bas zhus shing gtan la phab pa /
analyzed: slad nas bla ma de nyid dang / dge slong tshul khrims rgyal bas zhus shing gtan la phab pa /
translated: Later, the abbot himself and the monk Tshul-khrims-rgyal-ba revised it.

original: ye shes rdo rje kun las btus //
analyzed: ye shes rdo rje kun las btus //
translated: Wisdom-vajra is extracted from all.

original: rnal 'byor chen po'i gsal byed yin //
analyzed: rnal 'byor chen po'i gsal byed yin //
translated: It is the illuminator of the great yoga.

original: ye shes rang bzhin 'khor ba dang // mya ngan 'das pa'i ngo bo la //
analyzed: ye shes rang bzhin 'khor ba dang // mya ngan 'das pa'i ngo bo la //
translated: The nature of wisdom is the essence of samsara and nirvana.

original: de gnyis dbyer med rdo rje ste //
analyzed: de gnyis dbyer med rdo rje ste //
translated: Those two are the indivisible vajra.

original: kun 'dir 'dus pas kun las btus //
analyzed: kun 'dir 'dus pas kun las btus //
translated: Since all are included here, it is extracted from all.

original: de ston pa la der brtags nas //
analyzed: de ston pa la der brtags nas //
translated: Having examined that which teaches,

original: gzhung la'ang ming don 'tsham pa yin //
analyzed: gzhung la'ang ming don 'tsham pa yin //
translated: the name and meaning of the text are appropriate.
